communityRaces.description: Create your own community race and invite your colleagues, classmates, or friends by sharing a race invitation link. Access open races in this instance.

fundamentals.description: Learn the basics of RL to build your model, evaluate its performance on a virtual track, and then compete in a race.
fundamentals.header: Get started by learning the fundamentals of ML

models.description: Create a new model, or upload and manage existing models.
